name: arise
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

dsense.name: arise
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: Should the opportunity arise, I'd love to go to China.
example.egtrans: 要是有机会的话，我很想去中国。

example.eg: Could you work on Saturday, should the need arise (= if it were to be necessary)?
example.egtrans: 万一有需要，你可以在星期六工作吗？

example.eg: Are there any matters arising from (= caused by) the last meeting?
example.egtrans: 上次会议有没有引出什么问题？

dsense.name: arise
dsense.posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

example.eg: We arose early on Christmas morning.
example.egtrans: 圣诞节早晨，我们早早地起了床。
